title: APSO: Man kills his girlfriend and her daughter, turns gun on himself
content:
GALVEZ, LA (WAFB) -
Investigators say a man killed his girlfriend and her daughter at her home in Galvez.
According to the Ascension Parish Sheriff's Office, the incident happened Sunday, August 14 shortly before 2 p.m. at the woman's home on Oak Trace Road in Galvez. Investigators say Shawn Milet, 37,shot his girlfriend and her young daughter, then turned the gun on himself.
Officials say Milet met his girlfriend roughly six months ago via an online dating website. They say Milet had a history of domestic abuse and had recently been undergoing psychiatric care.
